EmailTemplate.name: 02_13_15 5.1 Webinar #2.02_13_15 Email #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Win A Home Lab With Demand-Driven Control For The App World | VMTurbo 5.1
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> Introducing Demand-Driven Control From The App To The Metal Join The VMTurbo 5.1 Release Webinar Next Thursday For A Chance To Win A Home Lab! <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> Next Thursday Find Out How Run-Time Application Demand Meets Real-Time Infrastructure Supply! Worried about QoS for your Java® Apps? Stop living in the past; live in the now. The Application Control Module <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps/vmturbo-application-control-module?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> will autoscale up or out based on real-time application demand, allowing you to assure application performance without over provisioning. What about self-service scaling? Covered. VMTurbo's Private Cloud Control <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps/vmturbo-private-cloud-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> provides your users with self-service scaling without sacrificing application performance. I/O intensive apps forcing you to overprovision? Not anymore. The Storage Control Module <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps/vmturbo-storage-control-module?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> - now integrated with HP 3PAR and Pure Storage ensures your most demanding apps get the resources they need while maximizing the efficient use of your storage infrastructure, preventing over provisioning. Ready to learn more? Join us for our webinar February, 19th at 1:30 PM EST, where will be giving away a Free Turbostack Home Lab valued at USD $1,600! Register Now! <http://www.vmturbo.com/demand-driven-control-for-apps?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> Downloads <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> White Papers <https://greencircle.vmturbo.com/welcome?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vbossy5-1&utm_content=021315> Green Circle 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
